br.span: Click On The Banner Above For COVID-19 Resources

div.h2: Foxborough Public Schools response to the Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic

span.style: text-align: center; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.style: font-family: "Open Sans", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center;
p.span: As we complete our third week of school closure, and as shared at School Committee on Monday night, I am incredibly proud of our administrators, staff, students, and families. The amount of work taking place among teachers and at home cannot be understated. We know how hard families are working during this challenging time. The collaboration among teachers, students, and families exemplifies our strong and caring Foxborough community. I have heard directly from parents about the positive impact of teachers and support providers who have reached out to support the social-emotional needs and check in on the physical well-being of students.

p.style: font-family: "Open Sans", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;
